title: Modules & Libraries
mission_log: Time-sensitive mission! Use Python's libraries to generate random passwords.
challenge: Use random module to print a random number between 1 and 10.
starter_code:

hints: random.randint(1, 10) generates a random number from 1 to 10
Store it in num: num = random.randint(1, 10)
